name: Evil Superhero VR (itch)
description:
*REQUIRES Oculus AirLink (free with your Oculus Quest) or Virtual Desktop to stream to your headset!

Powers included:

Sustained Supersonic Flight

Laser Vision

Super strength

Superhero Landing



This game world is massive, and includes: A large open world with a procedural environment, an entire ocean...

Airplanes you can laser out of the sky...

Unlimited Enemies you can Slice to bits with your Laser Vision, cars you can blow to pieces, and a Procedural AI Dismemberment System implemented into almost every NPC.

So you can slice up and kill almost ANYONE in this game: civilian and enemy alike! Whether by accident or choice... It's up to you! 

You can also fly at Supersonic speeds through the world. No one can escape you once you've set your sights on them.

You are the Superhuman. And you can do whatever the fuck you want.

I worked on this game for about 9 months straight, every day, to make it as realistic and fun as possible. I really tried to make this game, make you actually feel like Homelander, Brightburn, or Omni-man... in Virtual Reality.

Prepared to have the most fun in VR that you have ever experienced!!!

Stay tuned for updates, and other 'Evil Superhero' VR Experiences coming very soon... Such as 'Captain Washington', a game about a shield-wielding maniac with a hard-on for brutal justice! 

This is the first game in a series that will continue for years.
developers: Anark Studios - VR Dreams Made Real.
